title: The Four-Week Plan To Live Your Longest, Healthiest Life, with Dan Buettner
description:
Dan Buettner -- NYT best-selling author, National Geographic Explorer, and founder of The Blue Zones -- joins Jillian to discuss his latest book, The Blue Zones Challenge: A 4-Week Plan for a Longer, Better Life. The Blue Zones Challenge is about how to set up your life for health and longevity, with habits and behaviors that become a lifestyle. Dan and Jillian dive into the specifics of Blue Zone diets, from complex carbs to healthy fats like olive oil, grains, beans, nuts, seasonal fruits and vegetables. Learn to set up your kitchen, community, social group and more so you’re damn near guaranteed to live to 100!

Guest Links:

Websites:

https://danbuettner.com

https://www.bluezones.com

Books available on Amazon and on Dan’s website:

The Blue Zones Challenge and The Blue Zones Kitchen 

IG: @danbuettner, @bluezones


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Jillian Michaels Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1880466198675549

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com


You can find new episodes of Keeping It Real: Conversations with Jillian Michaels, completely ad free, on Wondery+ https://wondery.app.link/jillian
